data.message: Going to be third time seeing you.. being such a huge fan didn't think would get the chance to see you once let alone 3 times. Reading fest 13 little disappointed but Wembley 14 incredible!! Now on for Reading fest 17 😀😀

replies.message: Seen exactly the same shows as you mate, except i went leeds fest 13, already booked my ticket for this year cant wait
Why where you disappointed? It's eminem 😂 x
Will be my 5th time. London 2001, reading 2001, Milton Keynes 2003, reading 2013 and now reading 2017. Hopefully more dates too
Iona Grace there was little crowd interaction and he kept singing half a song and changing. Plus is was rammed so you could barely see him! X
Ditto be 4th time seeing him only reason got my tickets for Leeds today can't wait! 🤘🏻
Disappointed because you could not hear him but when the chorus of Stan was on she was crystal clear at Reading fest, but Wembley was a hell of a performance I know he going to smash it this year 🎤

Be my 4th time. T in the park festival Scotland 2010. V festival Staffordshire 2011. London Wembley stadium 2014. Front row every time, now leeds festival 2017. I was in Reading in 2013 but didn't Manange to get a ticket. So was stood outside the venue listening to him 😂 tried to meet him afterwards and went to his hotel but got told by his security guard to basically go away.
Man i wish i was 10 years older so i could see him perform at his peak, if i had to choose one show it would be the up in smoke tour
